Share.d: YTDL is tasker+termux project to download YouTube videos on android very easily and seamlessly.

Action.label:
This task to be executed only in case things go out of hand, and you want to stop all ongoing downloads.


This task will
* Kill Termux app
* Stop all ongoing downloads
* Remove all notifications made by this project.
* Stop all tasks associated with this project.
* Directory /sdcard/Tasker/ytdl will be cleared.


This task will NOT
* Delete your personal files
* Delete already downloaded videos
* Kill Tasker or other profiles
* Remove Tasker notifications created by other profiles.

Tasks below will remove tasker notifications that match a regex. Credits to
https://taskernet.com/shares/?user=AS35m8m%2BFga%2BPKETEENtyWu3IGqX35bmTIK3QzSMBeDWmVIVfQqyiHL%2FJjwHE%2FYoZuYG0oNb60waOn0%2Few%3D%3D&id=Task%3ACancel+Notification+By+Title+Match

Action.Str: Getting link info|Download timeout \-|Downloading \-|Download complete \-|Error getting info \(

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str: This will kill Termux app, and any other ytdl downloads going on will also be terminated.
Force kill termux and stop downloading

Action.label:
Simply run this task to be sure that your tasker has clipboard access.

If it asks you for write secure settings permission, follow Tasker guide for it.

Other if you are lazy like me, to not open your computer, simply share links to termux app instead, it works everytime 👍

Action.Str: Android 9 and below don't need to do this step, tasker already has clipboard access.

Action.label:
This task will check for project update from GitHub.

It is important to keep it updated because this project is new and can still have bugs

If there is an update you can copy the link and paste it in termux to update.

Remember to overwrite project while importing.

Action.Str: ytdl is up to date. Current version : %currversion Latest version : %http_data

Action.label: <font color="green">Receives any intent with action tasker.ytdl and execute task based on data recieved.

Tip: Stuck on getting info notification?

It can be because you are downloading a playlist with large number of videos, but if thats not the case, toggle off and on your internet, and then retry.

Action.Str: Press back button to select a folder

Action.Str: Format to download audio - mp3 or m4a ?

m4a formats are faster to download and better in quality. Recommended
mp3 formats would require conversion. Extra time taken for conversion. Embedding thumbnail currently not working.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str:
You can re-run this anytime if you want to change any setting.
Usage : Method 1: Share YouTube link to "Termux" app.
Method 2: Just copy any YouTube link to clipboard. (This will work only on <=android 9 users, or >=android 10 users with tasker having WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission. Launch the "Grant clipboard access" task, to learn how to grant permission)
Download Preferences: (0 is Ask everytime)
Download directory : %Folder_ytdl Download mode: %Mode_ytdl Preffered resolution : %Prefferedreso_ytdl Group playlist in seperate folder : %Playlisttoseperatedirectory Audio extension : %Extension_audio

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str: Where do you want to download videos and audios?

Action.label:
Tip: If a video is stuck on downloading webpage, try to re-download after timeout, or restart your wifi/mobile data. It is yt-dlp issue, not a tasker/project issue.

Setting the variable %silent_mode to "yes" will
* Suppress playlist list dialog, and download all video/audio of playlist.
* Suppress file already exist dialog and re-download and replace the file if it already exists.

Action.label:
Clears cache.

Basically clears partially downloaded videos and residual files in /sdcard/Tasker/ytdl, if any.

Dont run this while downloading a video, pls, unless you want download to fail or corrupt.

If you want to stop download press "stop download" button on notification.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str:
Make sure no ongoing download are running.
This step will delete the following directory: /sdcard/Tasker/ytdl/*

Action.label: <font color="green"> If you want to pass url to this project, call this task and pass url as %par1
<font color="green">This regex matches any YT or YT music link
